name: my-favourite-league
description: An application to keep track of your favorite or strongest champions in the MOBA League of Legends

scripts.setup: npm run install && cd frontend && npm run install && cd ../backend && npm run install
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cp -R ./frontend/build ./backend/build
scripts.auto-deploy: npm run setup && npm run clean && npm run deploy && npm run start

author: Fabian Kresler
